text.content_html: We want to make legal information as accessible as we can.
text.title: We want to make legal information as accessible as we can.

text.content_html: That means our data is open and accessible to everybody. You can interact with our data through our website and search. Or you can tap directly into our database through our API. All of our code is open source and licensed to the public under the GPL open source license.
text.title: That means our data is open and accessible to everybody.

text.content_html: Because we are a charity and have limited resources, access to our database and API is only for non-commercial purposes. This lets us make sure that our data isn’t copied by a commercial provider and locked away behind a paywall. If you need access to our data for commercial purposes but consider your use will still benefit the public by enhancing the accessibility of legal information, we will consider it – please get in touch.
text.title: Because we are a charity and have limited resources

text.content_html: You can use our search for any purpose including commercial purposes.
text.title: You can use our search for any purpose including commercial purposes.
